vulnerabilities.title: glob-parent 6.0.0 vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service
vulnerabilities.description:
glob-parent 6.0.0 is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS). This issue is fixed in version 6.0.1.

This vulnerability is separate from [GHSA-ww39-953v-wcq6](https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ww39-953v-wcq6).

vulnerabilities.title: glob-parent vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service in enclosure regex
vulnerabilities.description: This affects the package glob-parent before 5.1.2. The enclosure regex used to check for strings ending in enclosure containing path separator.
